d3d_features.json: Features and workarounds for D3D driver bugs and other issues.

features.name: mrt_perf_workaround
description: Some drivers have a bug where they ignore null render targets

features.name: set_data_faster_than_image_upload
description: Set data faster than image upload

features.name: zero_max_lod_workaround
description: Missing an option to disable mipmaps on a mipmapped texture

features.name: use_instanced_point_sprite_emulation
description: Some D3D11 renderers do not support geometry shaders for pointsprite emulation

features.name: depth_stencil_blit_extra_copy
description: Bug in some drivers triggers a TDR when using CopySubresourceRegion from a staging
texture to a depth/stencil

features.name: expand_integer_pow_expressions
description: The HLSL optimizer has a bug with optimizing 'pow' in certain integer-valued expressions

features.name: flush_after_ending_transform_feedback
description: Some drivers sometimes write out-of-order results to StreamOut buffers when transform
feedback is used to repeatedly write to the same buffer positions

features.name: get_dimensions_ignores_base_level
description: Some drivers do not take into account the base level of the
texture in the results of the HLSL GetDimensions builtin

features.name: pre_add_texel_fetch_offsets
description: HLSL's function texture.Load returns 0 when the parameter Location is negative, even if
the sum of Offset and Location is in range

features.name: emulate_tiny_stencil_textures
description: 1x1 and 2x2 mips of depth/stencil textures aren't sampled correctly

features.name: disable_B5G6R5_support
description: Textures with the format
DXGI_FORMAT_B5G6R5_UNORM have incorrect data

features.name: rewrite_unary_minus_operator
description: Evaluating unary minus operator on integer may get wrong answer in vertex shaders

features.name: emulate_isnan_float
description: Using isnan() on highp float will get wrong answer

features.name: call_clear_twice
description: Using clear() may not take effect

features.name: use_system_memory_for_constant_buffers
description: Copying from staging storage to constant buffer
storage does not work

features.name: select_view_in_geometry_shader
description: The viewport or render target slice will be selected in the geometry shader stage for
the ANGLE_multiview extension

features.name: add_mock_texture_no_render_target
description: On some drivers when rendering with no render target, two bugs lead to incorrect behavior

features.name: skip_VS_constant_register_zero
description: In specific cases the driver doesn't handle constant register zero correctly

features.name: force_atomic_value_resolution
description: On some drivers the return value from RWByteAddressBuffer.InterlockedAdd does not resolve
when used in the .yzw components of a RWByteAddressBuffer.Store operation

features.name: allow_clear_for_robust_resource_init
description: Some drivers corrupt texture data when clearing for robust resource initialization.

features.name: allow_translate_uniform_block_to_structured_buffer
description: There is a slow fxc compile performance issue with dynamic uniform indexing if
translating a uniform block with a large array member to cbuffer.

features.name: allow_ES3_on_FL10_0
description: Allow ES3 on 10.0 devices

features.name: disable_rasterizer_order_views
description: Disable ROVs for testing
